owner.description: The owner of the avatar. For a system avatar the owner is null (and nothing is returned). For non-system avatars this is the appropriate identifier, such as the ID for a project or the account ID for a user.

isSystemAvatar.description: Whether the avatar is a system avatar.

isSelected.description: Whether the avatar is used in Jira. For example, shown as a project's avatar.

isDeletable.description: Whether the avatar can be deleted.

fileName.description: The file name of the avatar icon. Returned for system avatars.

urls.description: The list of avatar icon URLs.
